### Using Color Explorer
The Color Explorer application can be found here: [Color Explorer](http://moflaherty.shinyapps.io/ColorExplorer/)

#### Settings
Color Explorer allows you to configure different control and color settings:  

* Chart Type: what type of chart is displayed
* Number of Bars/Slices: the number of elements displayed in the chart
* Color Theme: what color theme to display
